name: Concept 20
description:
Concept 20 consist of the following gameplays.

- Controlling only the ball you will jump your way into the yellow box.
- With the help of a flat bar, you will pick up the ball and try to traverse through all obstacles.
- With the help of numbered blocks you will must figure out a way to get to the yellow box.
- With 10 bars you will designs a path through various obstacles to complete the level.
